text: He muham'mada (sa.A.) Bhanidinuh ki jo jibra'ilako satru ho, jasale allahako sandesala'i usako adesanusara tapa'iko hrdayama utareko ho, juna sandesale uniharuko (aghika) granthaharula'i pramanita gardacha ra asthavanaharuka nimti margadarsaka ra subhasandesa ho. (Ta allaha pani tiniharuko satru ho)
